title: # 357 - Jim Gaffigan & ME
description:
Today I sit down in the mancave with Jim Gaffigan. We talk about having our kids in our acts, opening for the Pope, his acting career, treats, and much more!

Jim's new stand up special "Quality Time" is out now on Amazon!

This episode is brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free when you order a Quip electric toothbrush at www.getquip.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by 23andMe. Order your health and ancestry kit by going to www.23andme.com/bert

This episode is also brought to you by Ring. Make your neighborhood safer with the neighbors app by Ring. Text "Bertcast to 555-888 and download for free today at www.ring.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Honey. Honey is the smart shopping assistant that saves you time and money. Join free today at www.joinhoney.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Figs. Get 15% off of your first purchase by going to www.wearfigs.com and enter my code “Bert” at checkout.

This episode is also brought to you by Stance. Get a free pair of socks with your first purchase at www.stance.com/bert 


The Body Shots Fall Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE:
http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer
